text: allah tama dayaven ovunta pahala kala dæya magin satutata pat vuvan bavata sitinnaha. (tavada yuddhayehi maranayata pat vi) taman samaga ekatu novi tamangen pasu (melova pana pitin) sitinnan gænada “ovunta kisima biyak æti vanne næta. ovun duk vanneda næta” yayi itamat satutata pat vuvan vasayenda sitinnaha
